actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Navigation.

official_title: A bill to implement the provisions of Annex V to the International Convention for the Prevention of Pollution from Ships.

summary.text: Implements the provisions of Annex V to the International Convention for the Prevention of Pollution from Ships, relating to the prevention of pollution by garbage from ships. Directs the Secretary of Transportation to prescribe regulations accordingly.

titles.title: A bill to implement the provisions of Annex V to the International Convention for the Prevention of Pollution from Ships.
